images.title: Space Zombie 1
images.description: It's in Space and its living!

images.title: Space Swamp
images.description: A surreal alien swamp beneath a lavender sky and a distant, glowing planet — starlit pools and jagged spires reflected in oily water. (Magic/Proxy card art.)

images.title: Wizard of the Ice
images.description: An ancient ice-mage who bends winter to their will — shimmering frost, glowing runes, and a quiet stare that freezes time.

images.title: Hel, Underworld's Keeper
images.description: From the old German tales: Hel watches the threshold between worlds, a calm and terrible presence. Cloaked in half-shadow and half-bone, she guides the lost and judges the daring.
